root.name: day()

example.code:
def setup(): metaBold = loadFont("fonts/Meta-Bold.vlw.gz") textFont(metaBold, 44) noLoop()
def draw(): d = day() # Values from 1 - 31 m = month() # Values from 1 - 12 y = year() # 2003, 2004, 2005, etc. s = str(d) text(s, 10, 28) s = str(m) text(s, 10, 56) s = str(y) text(s, 10, 84)

root.description: Processing communicates with the clock on your computer. The day() function returns the current day as a value from 1 - 31.
